title: Let it bee: Concerto in C Minor by Vivaldi
brief_description: Excerpt from Bruno Bozzetto’s “Allegro Non Troppo”. A domesticated honey-bee prepares a picnic with wine and cheese but is disturbed by a romancing couple bent also on picnicking. Music from Vivaldi. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
